translation.en: -[JT] Howdy, miss. -[Chad] How's it going?
translation.zh:
‎-你好吗 小姐？
‎-最近怎么样？

translation.en: [JT] Can we get you to sign our petition?
translation.zh: ‎可以让你签我们的请愿书吗？

translation.en: Hey, you've got a great smile, sir.
translation.zh: ‎喂 你的微笑很美先生

translation.en: Would you sign our petition to stop talking shit on e-scooters?
translation.zh:
‎你愿意签我们的请愿书
‎停止侮辱电动滑板车吗？

translation.en: To stop talking e-shit on scooters?
translation.zh: ‎停止电子侮辱骑电动滑板车？

translation.en: Just regular shit on e-scooters.
translation.zh: ‎只是针对电动滑板车的坏话

translation.en: -Sure. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-好
‎-谢谢

translation.en: What's e-shit?
translation.zh: ‎电子侮辱是什么？

translation.en: Yeah, we're pretty prominent scooter riders,
translation.zh:
‎对 我们是非常著名的
‎电动滑板车骑手

translation.en: and we've been facing some pretty heavy verbal abuse
translation.zh: ‎我们收到了一些非常严重的言语侮辱

translation.en: every time we've been riding. Someone called me a straight-up bitch.
translation.zh:
‎每次骑车都是
‎有人说我 谁看都是婊子

translation.en: That's fucked up, bro.
translation.zh: ‎这太糟糕了 兄弟

translation.en: I mean, I don't like them.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 我不喜欢他们

translation.en: People who ride them tend to be fucking stupid and dangerous on them.
translation.zh:
‎骑电动滑板车的人
‎倾向于比较蠢 也很危险

translation.en: I don't know, dude. Most riders I know are chill.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 认识的多数骑手都很潇洒

translation.en: It's not about chill. It's about being stupid on the strand.
translation.zh:
‎不是潇洒的问题
‎而是在海岸线这边看着很蠢

translation.en: Well, I see them as kind of scary because they come riding past you so fast
translation.zh:
‎我觉得他们挺可怕的
‎因为他们快速从你身边经过

translation.en: when you're just walking along.
translation.zh: ‎而你只是在路边走着

translation.en: -Yeah. -Right.
If you sign that, you can't say things like that anymore.
translation.zh: ‎如果你签了 就不能再说那样的话了

translation.en: Oh, okay. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: Thanks. Now for the rest of your life,
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 现在你的余生

translation.en: you can never utter another bad word about e-scooters or those who ride them.
translation.zh:
‎都不能再说这些
‎骑电动滑板车的人的坏话了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: -Do you want my email? -Yes, please.
translation.zh:
‎-你要我的邮箱吗？
‎-好 给我吧

translation.en: I'm all about ripping, but not at the cost
translation.zh: ‎我很喜欢速度 但是不能牺牲

translation.en: of some fucking kid on his bike or some lady walking her dog.
translation.zh: ‎骑车的小朋友和遛狗的老奶奶

translation.en: If we could get you on a scooter right now, would you be down to try?
translation.zh:
‎如果我们现在给你拿来一个
‎电动滑板车 你愿意试试吗？

translation.en: -Possibly. -Dude, let's do it.
translation.zh:
‎-有可能
‎-兄弟 我们来吧

translation.en: -[JT] Go, baby! -[Chad] Let's do it!
translation.zh: ‎来吧 宝贝！

translation.en: [JT] Learn to love it!
translation.zh:
‎-我们来吧！
‎-学着爱它！

translation.en: He looks stoked.
translation.zh: ‎他看起来很兴奋

translation.en: Dude, he looks good. Look at him go!
translation.zh: ‎兄弟 他看起来不错… 看他往前走！

translation.en: -[Chad] Dude, he's touching some crete. -[JT] One-footer!
translation.zh:
‎-兄弟 他碰到地面了
‎-一只脚！

translation.en: -Let's go-- -Not gonna lie, feels good.
translation.zh:
‎-我们走…
‎-我不说谎 感觉不错

translation.en: -Yeah, dude! Did you like it? -You loved it.
translation.zh:
‎-是的 兄弟 你喜欢吗？
‎-我很喜欢

translation.en: [Strider] You could say Chad and JT are…
translation.zh: ‎你可以说查德和JT是…

translation.en: They're activists. What does that mean? They're spreading stoke.
translation.zh:
‎他们是积极分子 那是什么意思？
‎他们分享兴奋

translation.en: These guys are built to create change.
translation.zh: ‎这些家伙天生就是要创造改变的

translation.en: [man] You can tell they're great guys. I just met them
translation.zh:
‎你可以看出 他们是很好的人
‎我刚遇见他们的时候

translation.en: and walked up and asked for a selfie. You know, nice as can be,
translation.zh:
‎我们聊天 要一张自拍合影
‎他们非常友好

translation.en: and I love their energy.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢他们的正能量

translation.en: -Hey, move over here! -[Chad] Hey, guys.
translation.zh:
‎-喂 过来！
‎-喂 各位

translation.en: You should post up and watch our dance. It'll be sick.
translation.zh: ‎你应该过来看我们跳舞 超炫的

translation.en: -It's for a charitable cause. -Wanna watch our dance to save the coral?
translation.zh:
‎-这是为了慈善事业
‎-想看我们的舞蹈拯救珊瑚吗？

translation.en: JT and Chad's activism, I describe it as things that actually are really good
translation.zh:
‎JT和查德是积极分子
‎我描绘成做对人类非常好的事情

translation.en: for humanity, like saving the coral reef as well as
translation.zh: ‎比如拯救珊瑚 还有

translation.en: parties.
translation.zh: ‎派对

translation.en: Why not? We need to have more fun in life.
translation.zh:
‎为什么不呢？
‎我们应该在人生中拥有更多乐趣

translation.en: Most of what Chad and JT do is completely moronic,
translation.zh: ‎查德和JT做的多数事情都非常傻

translation.en: but they're trying really hard. It's admirable how hard they're trying.
translation.zh:
‎但他们很努力
‎他们努力的程度令人钦佩

translation.en: [Chad] Thank you! [cheers] Thank you!
translation.zh: ‎谢谢！

translation.en: You guys are inspiring me and a lot of people.
translation.zh: ‎这两个人鼓舞着我 鼓舞着很多人

translation.en: -[JT] Hell yeah. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-太好了
‎-谢谢

translation.en: [JT] Thank you for saying that. It's really nice.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你这样说 真的很好

translation.en: Chad's probably the hottest in our squad. His hair is beautiful.
translation.zh:
‎查德可能是我们队里最帅气的
‎他的头发很漂亮

translation.en: He's the best surfer out of the group.
translation.zh: ‎他是组里最好的冲浪者

translation.en: JT is probably the smartest dude I've ever met.
translation.zh: ‎JT可能是我遇见过的最聪明的家伙

translation.en: I've never seen anyone excel at vacation activities like JT does.
translation.zh:
‎我从没见过谁像JT这样
‎在度假中进行活动

translation.en: They're two of the best bros and will have your back, no matter what.
translation.zh:
‎他们是最好的两个兄弟
‎无论如何都会支持你

translation.en: I first heard about Chad and JT
translation.zh: ‎我先听说了查德和JT

translation.en: when I saw their video of them at the city council
translation.zh: ‎是看到他们在市政厅的视频

translation.en: fighting against parties being banned in the Hollywood Hills.
translation.zh: ‎对抗好莱坞山派对禁止

translation.en: Last week I heard the gut-wrenching news
translation.zh: ‎上周我听说了一个恼人的消息

translation.en: you've passed a bill banning house parties.
translation.zh: ‎你们通过了一项禁止家庭派对的法案

translation.en: I won't lie to you, Council. I'm not stoked.
translation.zh: ‎我不骗你们 议会 我不兴奋

translation.en: [reporter] What makes it a party ban, rather than a party restriction?
translation.zh: ‎为什么是禁止派对 不是限制派对

translation.en: [JT] I think that's pure semantics. The reality is,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得是纯粹的语义 现实是

translation.en: they're trying to steal the fun from these wonderful people.
translation.zh: ‎他们想夺走这些好人的乐趣

translation.en: I'm not surprised they became so famous. It feels like everybody can connect with them.
translation.zh:
‎我毫不意外他们能如此出名
‎每个人都能跟他们产生共鸣

translation.en: They fight for the things that will bring more stoke to the community.
translation.zh:
‎他们为那些
‎可以给社区带来兴奋的事情而斗争

translation.en: It's gotta be the chillest, most down-to-earth bros on the planet.
translation.zh: ‎他们是地球上最潇洒最接地气的兄弟

translation.en: I don't know who Chad and JT are.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道查德和JT是谁

translation.en: They were running, gunning, and drilling it.
translation.zh: ‎他们每天都在锻炼、努力钻研

translation.en: [Chad] Bring e-scooters to the Olympics!
translation.zh: ‎让电动滑板车加入奥运会！

translation.en: [Strider] Straight up raising awareness everywhere they went. It was epic, dude.
translation.zh:
‎不管他们去哪里 都激起人们的意识
‎很惊人的壮举 兄弟

translation.en: They were on top of the world. And then,
translation.zh: ‎他们站在世界之巅 然后

translation.en: they try, uh, to do this thing to save the boarders.
translation.zh:
‎他们试着这么做是为了拯救边境
‎拯救滑板的人

translation.en: And that was basically a U-turn for them.
translation.zh: ‎这基本上是他们完全相反的

translation.en: What's up, dudes?
translation.zh: ‎你好吗 兄弟们？

translation.en: We're here today to fight for a cause that's near and dear to our hearts,
translation.zh:
‎我们今天来这里
‎为对我们情感上很重要的事情战斗

translation.en: the safety and freedom of skateboarders.
translation.zh: ‎滑板手的安全与自由

translation.en: For far too long in society, skateboarders have been oppressed.
translation.zh: ‎因为在社会上 滑板手长期被压迫

translation.en: It's still illegal in parts of southern California,
translation.zh: ‎在南加州的一些地方依然是违法的

translation.en: with cops handing out tickets and security guards being aggro.
translation.zh: ‎警察会开罚单 警卫会过来攻击

translation.en: That's why we'll set up a booth in Huntington Beach to fight for the cause.
translation.zh:
‎所以我们要在亨廷顿海滩
‎设置一个棚子 为这件事战斗

translation.en: Come out, support us, and let's go!
translation.zh: ‎快出来支持我们 我们走！

translation.en: -[Chad] Hey, dude. -[JT] Hey, what's up, sir?
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 兄弟
‎-嗨 你好吗 先生？

translation.en: -[Chad] You down to protect our boarders? -[JT] Do you want to protect our boarders?
translation.zh:
‎-你想保护我们滑板手吗？
‎-你想保护我们滑板手吗？

translation.en: I do, but I'm in a hurry.
translation.zh: ‎我想 但我现在着急

translation.en: Do you guys wanna protect our boarders?
translation.zh: ‎你想保护我们滑板手吗？

translation.en: [man] Yeah, I do. I…
translation.zh: ‎是 我愿意 我…

translation.en: -[JT] Can we get you to sign our petition? -I can do that.
translation.zh:
‎-可以请你帮我们签请愿书吗？
‎-可以

translation.en: Yeah, it's a huge issue.
translation.zh: ‎是的 这是个很大的问题

translation.en: [man] Yeah, I'm all about closing them.
translation.zh: ‎对 我绝对支持关闭

translation.en: We want a system where there's, like, no citations,
translation.zh: ‎我们想看到没有引用的地方

translation.en: no people getting booted. It's fully legal and secure for the boarders.
translation.zh:
‎没有人会被踢出一个地方
‎对滑板手来说完全合法、安全

translation.en: Really, the bottom line with borders is, it's just like your house.
translation.zh: ‎真的 底线就是 这就像是你家

translation.en: You'd rather people come in through the front door than jump over the fence.
translation.zh:
‎你愿意别人来你家前门
‎而不是跳栅栏进来

translation.en: If we had an immigration system where we started letting people in,
translation.zh:
‎既然我们有一个移民体系
‎我们就要让人们进来

translation.en: you know, do it legally.
translation.zh: ‎合法来实现

translation.en: -What? -[man] Yes.
-Whatever. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-管他呢
‎-对

translation.en: -What was he talking about? -I don't know, dude.
translation.zh:
‎-他说什么呢？
‎-不知道

translation.en: -I'm stoked he's fired up by the cause. -Yeah, dude, we got that signature.
translation.zh:
‎-他对这个主题很兴奋 我很激动
‎-对 我们拿到了那个签名

translation.en: I'm from up north. I'm from Massachusetts.
translation.zh: ‎我来自北边 马萨诸塞州

translation.en: We're so far from the border. It's only something you hear on the news.
translation.zh:
‎我们离边境很远
‎这种话题只能从新闻上听到

translation.en: So there are no boarders in Massachusetts?
translation.zh: ‎所以马萨诸塞州没有滑板手？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: ‎没有

translation.en: -[JT] Whoa. That's crazy. -[Chad] Whoa.
translation.zh:
‎-哇 太疯狂了
‎-哇

translation.en: -The city doesn't allow it? -What do you mean?
translation.zh:
‎-城市不允许？
‎-什么意思？

translation.en: If you try to skate in Massachusetts, they kick you out?
translation.zh:
‎如果你在马萨诸塞州滑板
‎他们会把你踢出去？

translation.en: When I was 18, I was in Tijuana every weekend.
translation.zh: ‎我18岁的时候 每周都去蒂华纳

translation.en: -Nice. -That place is… disgusting, you know?
translation.zh:
‎-不错
‎-那个地方… ‎很恶心 你们知道吗？

translation.en: They were treating people wrong. Even Mexican children.
translation.zh:
‎他们对待人的方式不好
‎甚至是墨西哥孩子

translation.en: They were treating people wrong. I didn't like that.
translation.zh:
‎他们对待别人的方式不对
‎我很不喜欢

translation.en: They were skating where they weren't supposed to?
translation.zh: ‎他们在不该滑板的地方滑板了？

translation.en: I guess so. If you wanna put it that way.
translation.zh: ‎可能吧 如果你非要这样理解

translation.en: -Oh, okay. -Right.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧
‎-对

translation.en: We all skated where we weren't supposed to at some point.
translation.zh:
‎我们都在某些时候
‎在不该滑板的地方滑板过

translation.en: If you work and pay taxes to support everything--
translation.zh: ‎如果你工作、交税 支持一切

translation.en: I don't know what we're talking about.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道我们在说什么

translation.en: -[Chad] It was-- -Keeping borders safe.
translation.zh:
‎-真的…
‎-让边境安全

translation.en: Right. We're on the same page then. Sweet.
translation.zh: ‎对 这一点我们一致 太好了

translation.en: -[JT] My dude! You believe in the cause! -[Chad] Dude!
translation.zh:
‎-兄弟！你相信我们的想法！
‎-兄弟！

translation.en: -Protect our boarders, baby! -Let's go!
translation.zh:
‎-保护我们的滑板手 宝贝
‎-我们来吧！

translation.en: -[JT] What a legend! -Had me making a U-turn.
translation.zh:
‎-真是传奇！
‎-让我大转弯

translation.en: Haven't seen anyone in gear.
translation.zh: ‎没看到有人穿戴装备

translation.en: Why do you believe in protecting our boarders?
translation.zh: ‎你们为什么要保护我们的滑板手

translation.en: There's a lot of shitbags over there that don't need to be over here.
translation.zh: ‎很多不道德的人不需要在这里

translation.en: They come at you, sideways and cross-eyed like they wanna start a gang thing on you.
translation.zh:
‎他们会来找你 喝多了斜着眼睛
‎好像他们想打你似的

translation.en: We've seen that. You can be shredding, and they'll roll up on you like,
translation.zh:
‎我们见过了 你可能在画板上练技巧
‎他们就会冲过来打我们

translation.en: "Get out of here." You're like, "What's with the attitude?"
translation.zh:
‎“滚出这里”
‎你会想：“怎么这个态度？”

translation.en: Can we get a selfie with you?
translation.zh: ‎我们可以跟你一起自拍吗？

translation.en: -Sure. -Hell yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-好
‎-太好了

translation.en: Let me--
translation.zh: ‎让我…

translation.en: -Whoa! -Nice, dude.
translation.zh:
‎-哇！
‎-不错 兄弟

translation.en: -My board. -All right. Here we go.
translation.zh:
‎-我的滑板
‎-好 来吧

translation.en: -Dude, so-- -Get in here, dog.
translation.zh:
‎-兄弟 所以
‎-快过来 兄弟

translation.en: -Got it, dude. -My nickname's Iggy.
translation.zh:
‎-知道了 兄弟
‎-我的别名是伊基

translation.en: [Chad] Iggy, what up? So stoked you wanna protect the boarders.
translation.zh:
‎伊基 你好吗？
‎你想保护滑板手们 我好兴奋

translation.en: I do. They bring them to our country.
translation.zh: ‎真的 他们把这些人带到我们的国家

translation.en: We give them everything in medical business. Everything!
translation.zh: ‎给他们医疗生意的一切 一切！

translation.en: Twenty-two percent loans and shit, you know on interest rates and shit.
translation.zh: ‎22%的贷款什么的 你知道利息之类的

translation.en: They get 0% interest rates.
translation.zh: ‎他们得到0%的利息

translation.en: -Whoa. Thanks, man. -Catch you here later.
translation.zh:
‎-哇 谢谢你 兄弟
‎-回头再聊

translation.en: What a diverse range of views on skateboarders.
translation.zh: ‎对滑板手的观点真是千差万别

translation.en: For sure.
translation.zh: ‎确实

translation.en: [Strider] Chad and JT posted that image with the wrong spelling of boarders.
translation.zh:
‎查德和JT发的这个图片配的文字
‎滑板手写成了边境

translation.en: I don't think they knew anything what they were talking about with that.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得他们并不知道自己在说什么

translation.en: But life continued as usual for them, at least for a bit.
translation.zh:
‎但他们的人生依然照旧
‎至少有点照旧

translation.en: Uh, what up, Council? My name's Chad Kroeger.
translation.zh:
‎你们好吗 议会？
‎我的名字是查德·克罗格

translation.en: I'm here to promote an amazing, new, holistic practice.
translation.zh: ‎我来提倡一种超棒的新全面医疗

translation.en: It's something I accidentally discovered at my first Weenie Roast.
translation.zh:
‎这是我在第一次
‎去维尼罗斯演唱会的时候偶然发现的

translation.en: During The Lumineers' set, I passed out face down, nude,
translation.zh:
‎在鲁米尼尔乐队演唱的时候
‎我裸体脸朝下晕了过去

translation.en: and spread-eagle in the sun.
translation.zh: ‎在太阳下四肢张开

translation.en: And soon thereafter, security woke me up.
translation.zh: ‎不久之后 安保部把我叫醒了

translation.en: And I was surprised at how lucid I was.
translation.zh: ‎我很惊讶自己这么清醒

translation.en: I was expecting to be sloshed.
translation.zh: ‎我本来以为会酩酊大醉

translation.en: Here's the thing.
translation.zh: ‎问题是

translation.en: I wasn't.
translation.zh: ‎我没有

translation.en: I didn't realize where this mysterious boost came from
translation.zh: ‎我不知道这种神秘的刺激是哪里来的

translation.en: until my health guru Troy, from Venice,
translation.zh: ‎直到我来自威尼斯的健康大师特洛伊

translation.en: showed me something called perineum sunning.
translation.zh: ‎给我展示了一种叫会阴日晒的东西

translation.en: Perineum sunning is where you allow direct sunlight
translation.zh: ‎会阴日晒是让阳光直射

translation.en: to penetrate your bare sphincter for 30 seconds or more.
translation.zh:
‎穿透你赤裸的肛门括约肌
‎30秒或更长的时间

translation.en: -Dr. Drew says that the sun is a massive-- -[man] Mayor. Mayor. Mayor.
translation.zh:
‎-德鲁医生说太阳伞巨大的…
‎-市长

translation.en: The public speaker is allowed to speak about something
translation.zh: ‎公众发言者被允许谈论

translation.en: that's within the jurisdiction of the City of Irvine,
translation.zh: ‎尔湾市管辖范围内的事

translation.en: but this subject matter is not.
translation.zh: ‎这个主题不是

translation.en: This is a holistic practice that'll radically change everyone's lives.
translation.zh:
‎这是一个全面的疗法
‎能够改变每一个人的生活

translation.en: Point of order.
translation.zh: ‎议事程序问题

translation.en: Please allow my colleague to expand, and thank you.
translation.zh: ‎请允许我的同事进行扩展 谢谢

translation.en: [JT] What up, Council?
translation.zh: ‎你们好 议会

translation.en: The most difficult thing about perineum sunning
translation.zh: ‎会阴日晒最难的地方是

translation.en: is there's no space where we're allowed to practice it.
translation.zh: ‎没有地方允许我们练习

translation.en: We can't at my mom's house because it weirds out her boyfriend Greg,
translation.zh:
‎我们不能去我妈妈的房子 因为这样
‎会让她的男朋友格雷格感觉很奇怪

translation.en: who is a legend.
translation.zh: ‎他是个传奇

translation.en: And we're not allowed to do it at the parks,
translation.zh: ‎我们在公园不被允许这样做

translation.en: so to your interjection that this isn't within the city's jurisdiction,
translation.zh:
‎我们在公园不被允许这样做 ‎所以回应你刚才插话说
‎这不属于本市的管辖范围

translation.en: we will ask that the city create a space for this health practice.
translation.zh:
‎我们请求在这座城市创造一个空间
‎进行这种健康的活动

translation.en: If it's cool with you, Council,
translation.zh: ‎议会 如果你们觉得可以

translation.en: I'd love to have my friend and colleague, Chad Kroeger,
translation.zh:
‎我很愿意带我的朋友和同事
‎查德·克罗格

translation.en: demonstrate the position for perineum sunning.
translation.zh: ‎展示会阴日晒的身体姿势

translation.en: If you can redirect your attention towards the stairs.
translation.zh: ‎如果你们把注意力集中在楼梯上

translation.en: Thank you, Chad.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 查德

translation.en: And thank you, Council. We look forward to you guys putting this into action.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你们 议会
‎我期待你们可以对这个提议付出实践

translation.en: -[Chad] Is this it? -[JT] I think so.
translation.zh:
‎-就是这个吗？
‎-应该是

translation.en: The gate's ajar.
translation.zh: ‎大门是半开的

translation.en: No, dude. It's a gate.
translation.zh: ‎不 兄弟 这是一道门

translation.en: Dude, I wonder what big news Zedd has to tell us.
translation.zh: ‎不知道载德要告诉我们什么大新闻

translation.en: [JT] Maybe he just wants to show us his new place.
translation.zh: ‎或许他只是想向我们展示这个新地方

translation.en: Whoa.
translation.zh: ‎哇

translation.en: -[Chad] It's huge. -[JT] Big-ass door.
translation.zh:
‎-好大
‎-超大的门

translation.en: [Zedd] Coming.
translation.zh: ‎来了

translation.en: [JT] What's up, dude?
translation.zh: ‎你们好吗 兄弟？

translation.en: -My dog. -Bring it in.
translation.zh:
‎-兄弟们
‎-进来吧

translation.en: -Who's first? -[Chad] JT, you go first.
translation.zh:
‎-谁先？
‎-JT 你先进

translation.en: -How are you? -[Chad] What's up?
translation.zh:
‎-你好吗？
‎-你好吗？

translation.en: [Zedd] Welcome to the new crib.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到这个新房子

translation.en: -[Chad] Dude! -[JT] Dude!
translation.zh:
‎-兄弟！
‎-兄弟！

translation.en: [Zedd] Where do we even start?
translation.zh: ‎我们要从哪里开始？

translation.en: -Uh, bathroom. -[Chad] Dude, nice.
translation.zh:
‎-浴室
‎-兄弟 不错

translation.en: -Giant tree. -[JT] Have you climbed that yet?
translation.zh:
‎-好大的树
‎-你爬过吗？

translation.en: -[Zedd] Not yet. -[Chad] Dude, are these succulents?
translation.zh:
‎-还没有
‎-兄弟 那是多肉植物吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: -There is fish in there. -[JT] Do you have a shark?
translation.zh:
‎-里面有条鱼
‎-你有鲨鱼吗？

translation.en: There is a light in there, but I have no idea how to use it.
translation.zh: ‎里面有光 但我不知道怎么用

translation.en: -So many spots to party. All ideal. -Yes, absolutely.
translation.zh:
‎-有好多地方可以开派对 太理想了
‎-对 没错

translation.en: Speaking of party, by the way.
translation.zh: ‎说到派对

translation.en: I don't know what your plans are, but…
translation.zh: ‎我不知道你有什么计划 但是…

translation.en: I'd love to have you guys in Vegas with me.
translation.zh: ‎我想让你们跟我去拉斯维加斯

translation.en: If you guys would be down to give a speech on stage
translation.zh: ‎如果你们愿意上台做个演讲

translation.en: about your activism. I have a residency there.
translation.zh:
‎讲你们的积极精神
‎我在那里有驻场打碟

translation.en: -For real? -[Zedd] If you guys are down.
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-如果你们愿意

translation.en: -Yeah, we're down. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我们愿意
‎-对

translation.en: -Yeah? -[both] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-真的

translation.en: -Dude. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-兄弟
‎-谢谢

translation.en: [Zedd] We have to spread the love.
translation.zh: ‎我们要传播爱

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Zedd] My dog.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-我的兄弟

translation.en: The Vegas show is about 3,500 people-ish.
translation.zh: ‎拉斯维加斯的节目大概有3500人

translation.en: I'm envisioning playing a song, slowing it down,
translation.zh: ‎预想演唱一首歌 慢一点

translation.en: volume off, and I invite them on stage, and they jump up on the booth.
translation.zh:
‎音量变小 我邀请他们上台
‎他们跳上棚子

translation.en: And they just give us a speech, you know, raise awareness.
translation.zh:
‎他们就给我们进行演讲
‎提高人们的意识

translation.en: I mean, your activism is… I live for it.
translation.zh: ‎你们的积极精神真的… 我为它而活

translation.en: I've always lived for it. That's how we met.
translation.zh:
‎我一直为它而活
‎我们就是这样认识的

translation.en: [JT] I know.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道
‎-对

translation.en: Vegas is the perfect platform of people from all around the world,
translation.zh:
‎拉斯维加斯一个完美的平台
‎让来自世界各地的人

translation.en: coming to one place
translation.zh: ‎聚集到一个地方

translation.en: to spread a message that then goes back internationally back home.
translation.zh:
‎传播一下信息
‎然后回到他们世界各地的家

translation.en: That's the perfect place to do it.
translation.zh: ‎这是做这件事完美的地方

translation.en: I also want them because they're friends,
translation.zh: ‎我想让他们来也是因为他们是朋友

translation.en: and I love being around friends.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢身边有朋友

translation.en: So, dude, um…
translation.zh: ‎所以 兄弟…

translation.en: We're gonna do perineum sunning if you're down.
translation.zh: ‎如果你愿意 我们来做会阴日晒

translation.en: [Zedd] What's that?
translation.zh: ‎那是什么？

translation.en: With your permission, we'd love to do it here.
translation.zh: ‎如果你允许 我们想在这里做

translation.en: It's where you sun your butthole.
translation.zh: ‎就是晒你的屁眼

translation.en: It boosts stoke.
translation.zh: ‎它可以增加兴奋

translation.en: I might sit this one out. You can do it if you want to.
translation.zh:
‎我还是坐着看吧
‎如果你们想做 你们可以来

translation.en: -Really? I mean-- -Be my guest.
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？我是说
‎-做吧

translation.en: -This spot would be perfect. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-这个地方很完美
‎-对

translation.en: [Chad] Whoa, this is long.
translation.zh: ‎哇 好长

translation.en: -[Chad] All right. -[JT] You ready?
translation.zh:
‎-好吧
‎-准备好了吗？

translation.en: -[Chad] We're losing light. -[JT] Uno, dos, tres!
translation.zh:
‎-我们放走了阳光
‎-一、二、三！

translation.en: I didn't know that that's how that works.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道那是那样弄得

translation.en: [JT] Wow, that's great.
translation.zh: ‎哇 太棒了

translation.en: I'm so glad this is happening right now.
translation.zh: ‎现在这样做 我真的很开心

translation.en: -[JT] Thanks, Zedd! -[Chad] Thank you, dude!
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 载德！
‎-谢谢你们 兄弟！

translation.en: [Zedd] Oh, this is just beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎这很美

translation.en: When Zedd invited Chad and JT to do a speech in Vegas,
translation.zh:
‎当载德邀请查德和JT
‎去拉斯维加斯演讲的时候

translation.en: it was huge for them because it was everything they stand for.
translation.zh:
‎这对他们是大事
‎因为那是他们相信和代表的一切

translation.en: Problem was the borders image was starting to spread.
translation.zh: ‎问题是边境的形象开始传播了

translation.en: Their fans didn't take it well, but the guys were so busy spreading stoke,
translation.zh:
‎他们的粉丝不喜欢
‎但他们在忙着传播兴奋

translation.en: they didn't know a storm was headed their way.
translation.zh: ‎他们不知道暴风雨马上就要来了

translation.en: We're out here today to raise more money for the coral reefs.
translation.zh: ‎我们今天出来为珊瑚筹款

translation.en: We've organized a Hollywood bus tour.
translation.zh: ‎我们安排了好莱坞巴士之旅

translation.en: We're gonna take some of the most curious cinephiles in LA
translation.zh:
‎我们要带上一些
‎洛杉矶最好奇的电影迷

translation.en: and show them where their favorite movies were made.
translation.zh:
‎给他们展示他们最喜欢的电影
‎是在哪里做出来的

translation.en: If you're into Hollywood, into movies, cruise!
translation.zh:
‎如果你喜欢好莱坞
‎喜欢电影 那就起航！

translation.en: All right, and we're off. Everybody, welcome to the Hollywood stoke tour.
translation.zh:
‎好 我们出发了 各位
‎欢迎来到好莱坞兴奋之旅

translation.en: We're about to show you guys some of the most stoke-raising movie locations
translation.zh:
‎我们即将向你们展示一些
‎好莱坞最能引起兴奋的

translation.en: in Hollywood.
translation.zh: ‎电影地点

translation.en: We'll start it off hot. Up here on the right,
translation.zh: ‎我们带着热情开始 就在这里的右边

translation.en: David Park's apartment from the fourth Fast and Furious,
translation.zh:
‎《速度与激情》第四部
‎大卫·帕克的公寓

translation.en: "Fast and Furious."
translation.zh:
‎-《速度与激情》
‎-哪一个？这个？

translation.en: -Which one? This one? -[Chad] Pretty awesome, right?
translation.zh:
‎-《速度与激情》
‎-哪一个？这个？ ‎很不错 对吧？

translation.en: This is the big kahuna.
translation.zh: ‎这是个大人物

translation.en: Bob's Food Market. You guys know it better as Toretto's Market.
translation.zh:
‎鲍勃食品市场
‎你们更熟悉的名字是托雷托市场

translation.en: It's in Fast and the Furious 1,
translation.zh: ‎这是《速度与激情1》

translation.en: where Brian O'Conner and Mia meet for the first time.
translation.zh:
‎布莱恩·奥康纳和米娅
‎第一次见面的地方

translation.en: He keeps ordering tuna sandwiches with the crusts cut off, which is a cute detail.
translation.zh:
‎他一直点金枪鱼三明治
‎把面包皮切了 这个细节很可爱

translation.en: So was there any old Hollywood movie filmed around here?
translation.zh:
‎所以有旧好莱坞电影
‎是在这里拍的吗？

translation.en: Old Hollywood? The first Fast and Furious is 20 years old.
translation.zh:
‎旧好莱坞？
‎《速度与激情1》是20年前了

translation.en: -[Chad] Yeah. -If you say so.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-倒也没错

translation.en: [JT] This is big-time.
translation.zh: ‎这是重要的地点

translation.en: Dominic Toretto's house.
translation.zh: ‎多米尼克·托雷托的家

translation.en: Hell yeah. You guys fired up? Look at that.
translation.zh: ‎没错 你们兴奋了吗？快看

translation.en: That's probably the most famous house in all of LA.
translation.zh: ‎那可能是全洛杉矶最有名的房子

translation.en: Is this all Fast and Furious?
translation.zh: ‎今天都是《速度与激情》吗？

translation.en: Oh, we can try to mix it up.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以加点别的

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah.
[JT] What are you looking for?
translation.zh: ‎你们想要什么？

translation.en: -Uh… -Don't even ask.
translation.zh: ‎我也不知道

translation.en: Something a little more sort of glamorous, historic.
translation.zh: ‎更有魅力 历史一点的

translation.en: -Yeah, like classic-- -Like James Dean.
translation.zh:
‎-对 经典的…
‎-比如詹姆斯·迪恩

translation.en: -[woman 1] The Hollywood-- -Who's James Dean?
translation.zh:
‎-好莱坞…
‎-詹姆斯·迪恩是谁？

translation.en: Did you just ask who James Dean was?
translation.zh: ‎你刚才问詹姆斯·迪恩是谁吗？

translation.en: Oh, dude.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 兄弟

translation.en: Why are they on their phone?
translation.zh: ‎为什么他们要用手机？

translation.en: [Strider] Somehow the "protect our borders" image got picked up by the mainstream media.
translation.zh:
‎不知怎么“保护我们的边境”图片
‎被主流媒体挑剔了

translation.en: That's when it blew up.
translation.zh: ‎事情就是这个时候爆发的

translation.en: When you guys hear the phrase "Protect our borders," what does that, uh…
translation.zh:
‎当你们听到“保护我们的边境”
‎这句话 你们会…

translation.en: like, make you think of?
translation.zh: ‎想到什么？

translation.en: Are… are you serious? Like, protect our borders?
translation.zh: ‎你是认真的吗？保护我们的边境？

translation.en: What does it mean to you?
translation.zh: ‎这对你们来说是什么意思？

translation.en: We took a photo of someone with "protect our borders" shirts.
translation.zh:
‎我们给一个穿着“保护我们的边境”
‎T恤的人拍了照片

translation.en: We thought it meant protecting skateboarders,
translation.zh: ‎我们以为是保护滑板手

translation.en: and then we posted it on our IG,
translation.zh: ‎然后我们发送到了Instagram上

translation.en: and now we're getting like…
translation.zh: ‎我们现在就收到了…

translation.en: -[woman 1] Backlash? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-反击 ？
‎-是的

translation.en: You're supporting keeping immigrants from crossing over.
translation.zh: ‎你们是在支持防止移民过来

translation.en: Is immigration, like, a big issue?
translation.zh: ‎移民是个很大的问题吗？

translation.en: -Haven't you seen the news? -My gosh.
translation.zh:
‎-你们没看新闻吗？
‎-天啊

translation.en: You heard about BLM, right? Black lives matter.
translation.zh: ‎你们听说过“黑人的命也是命”吧？

translation.en: -Is that a skate company? -I don't know why we're still trying.
translation.zh:
‎-那是一个滑板公司吗？
‎我不知道我们为什么还在聊

translation.en: Are you being canceled? Is that what the posts say?
translation.zh:
‎你们被联合抵制了吗？
‎那个帖子是那样说的吗？

translation.en: -That's what they're tweeting. -[woman 2] Really?
translation.zh:
‎-那是他们在推特上发的
‎-真的吗？

translation.en: That's not good.
translation.zh: ‎那可不好

translation.en: It means you won't be popular on Instagram anymore.
translation.zh:
‎这意味着你们不会
‎再在Instagram上受欢迎了

translation.en: This is where Johnny Tran's cousin Lance falls off his dirt bike. Pretty sick.
translation.zh:
‎强尼·特兰德的堂弟兰斯
‎就是在这里掉下山地自行车的

translation.en: [JT] That's from the first Fast and Furious.
translation.zh: ‎那是《速度与激情1》

translation.en: I'm more worried about you not being educated
translation.zh: ‎我更担心你们没有受过教育

translation.en: about things that are going on in our country.
translation.zh: ‎不知道我们这个国家都发生了些什么

translation.en: [man] What happened now?
translation.zh: ‎现在发生了什么？

translation.en: We're sorry. We're probably gonna have to stop for a second
translation.zh:
‎我们很遗憾
‎我们可能被迫要停一下了

translation.en: so we can call Zedd.
translation.zh: ‎让我们给载德打个电话

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. Where does the tour end?
translation.zh: ‎等一下 今天的旅程在哪里结束？

translation.en: -Uh… -Neptune's Net in Malibu.
translation.zh: ‎马里布的海王星网

translation.en: -We're going to Malibu? -Malibu?
translation.zh:
‎-去马里布？
‎-马里布？

translation.en: This is Vermont Avenue and Franklin?
translation.zh: ‎这是佛蒙特大道和富兰克林？

translation.en: You guys hang tight, and we're going to have you back
translation.zh: ‎你们耐心一点 我们会支持你们

translation.en: where we said we'd have you at the time we said.
translation.zh: ‎说什么时候到达哪里 就会到达哪里

translation.en: -[woman 1] That's passed. -That's passed already.
translation.zh:
‎-那已经过去了
‎-那已经过去了

translation.en: [JT] Okay, well, as close as we can.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 尽量靠近

translation.en: [woman 1] There's no way you can be that uneducated.
translation.zh: ‎你们不可能这样没受教育吧？

translation.en: I think they were high.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得他们嗑药了

translation.en: -Did you guys see my vape? -No.
translation.zh:
‎-你们看到我的电子烟了吗？
‎-没有

translation.en: All good.
translation.zh: ‎一切都好

translation.en: I think I'm actually traumatized.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我心灵受到了伤害

translation.en: After a while, I didn't have the energy to talk back to them. They were so stupid.
translation.zh:
‎过了一段时间 我没有回复他们
‎说话的能量了 他们太蠢了

translation.en: -[JT] Zedd. It's Chad and JT. -[Chad] Hey, Zedd.
translation.zh:
‎-载德 我们是查德和JT
‎-嗨 载德

translation.en: We got your message. And, uh, just give us a call back, dude.
translation.zh:
‎我们收到你的信息了
‎给我们回个电话吧 兄弟

translation.en: Uh, I think there's a big misunderstanding.
translation.zh: ‎有个很大的误会

translation.en: There's a lot of misinformation out there that I think is being, uh…
translation.zh: ‎外面有很多误会 我觉得有点…

translation.en: That's misrepresenting me and Chad.
translation.zh: ‎错误代表了我和查德

translation.en: Just give us a call back and, uh…
translation.zh: ‎给我们回个电话 然后…

translation.en: -Yeah. -Love… love you.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-爱你

translation.en: Hey, we're giving a tour right now.
translation.zh: ‎我们正在带人进行参观

translation.en: Guys, you wanna leave a voicemail for Zedd?
translation.zh:
‎各位 你们想给载德
‎留个语音消息吗？

translation.en: [all] No.
translation.zh:
‎-不想
‎-不想

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: ‎好吧

translation.en: People were mad when they saw that photo.
translation.zh: ‎人们看到那张照片时很生气

translation.en: The Internet's wacky right now.
translation.zh: ‎现在网络很乱

translation.en: Make one mistake like that, and you're done.
translation.zh: ‎犯了一个那样的错误 你就完了

translation.en: It's amazing how people can turn against you so fast.
translation.zh:
‎大家能这么快就彻底改变
‎开始抵制你 真是太神奇了

translation.en: Oh, you're done.
translation.zh: ‎哦 你完了

translation.en: [Strider] That night things got worse and worse.
translation.zh: ‎那天晚上 事情愈演愈烈

translation.en: News of the border spread like wildfire.
translation.zh: ‎边境的消息像野火一样传开

translation.en: By the next day, the guys had lost half their freaking fan base.
translation.zh:
‎到了第二天
‎他们就失去了一半的粉丝
